column5: I found this video and had to upload it to my site. Its a father who never gave up on his son. Very nice story. If you got few minutes its well worth it.  CLICK HERE
It takes love. A whole bunch of it.  Each and every day.
The love of a father for his son great video

Yeah that is a gem. I've seen it several times on Youtube:  <embed id="VideoPlayback" src="http://video.google.com/googleplayer.swf?docid=-1615280614326902691&hl=en&fs=true" style="width:400px;height:326px" allowFullScreen="true" allowScriptAccess="always" type="application/x-shockwave-flash"> </embed>
Oh man that was one tough video for me to watch.   The love and courage this dad has for his son is incredible. Leechman
Roy - Yeah, I had it sent to me and it was on another playback - Google I think.  Love it!

Leechman - I hope your doing ok under your situation. I lost my father-in-law a few years so our family went through those hard times as well. This is a good time to surround yourself around friends and family to share those good times.  Were all thinking of ya man!!!  Best,  Mike
I'm doing ok Mike, don't worry.... just got a little intense watching it and brought a memory flash. Jacques
Thanks Mike! I've also seen that video and read the story quite a few times. Don't make the "choking up" any less just the same. A great story, but tough to watch without feeling something.
